verses.1: No gam ukte aw, a manin thu na khen uh hiam? Note in mi khempeuhʼ thu a tangin na khen uh hiam?
verses.2: Hi peuhmah lo hi; na lungsim uh ah a man lo na ngaihsun uh a, gam sungah ngongtatna na gamta uh hi.
verses.3: Migilote a khantawnun khial uh hi. A suah tung mahun lam khial pah uh a, zuau thu gen uh hi.
verses.4: Amaute in gulpiʼ gu bang gu nei uh a, a khiimteʼ aw ahi a, a zol siamteʼ aw ahi zongin bangmah a za het lo, gul bilngong tawh kibang uh hi.
verses.6: Pasian aw, amauʼ kam sunga a om a hate uh sutan inla, humpinelkai khanglai hatu-te bot khia in, Topa aw.
verses.7: Tui luang khiate bangin amaute mangthangsak inla, lopa bangin amaute kituancil gawpin keu tumsak in.
verses.8: Amaute a naai a bei toktol, a hun cing loin a suak, ni a mu ngei lote bangsak in.
verses.9: Na beelte in lingkung kuang sa a sak ma-in, a hing a keu-in amah in phiat khia mang hen.
verses.10: Heh thukna a muh ciangin thuman mipa lungdam dinga, migiloteʼ sisan sungah amah in a khete sil ding hi.
verses.11: Mite in, “Thuman mi ading noptuamna om taktak a, leitung thu a khen Pasian khat om taktak hi,” ci ding uh hi.
